        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_22" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_8" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <div>
 To submit claims, please provide us the below required documents for different claim types.
</div>
</div></div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_9" class="remove-bottom-space A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <h4 class="A-TYP16B-RW-ALL heading">Death Benefit Claims</h4>
</div></div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_10" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <ul class="A-LSTU-RW-ALL"> 
 <li>Death Claim Form with Part I fully completed and signed by Beneficiary(ies)/Claimant(s)</li> 
 <li>Death Claim Form with Part II fully completed and signed by the Attending Physician with chop, if needed</li> 
 <li>Certified True Copy Death Certificate of Insured Person Certified by Bank Staff</li> 
 <li>Copy of ID Card/Passport/Birth Certificate of Insured Person</li> 
 <li>Copy of ID Card/Passport/Birth Certificate copy of Beneficiary(ies)/Claimant(s)</li> 
 <li>Copy of Relationship Proof Between Insured Person and Beneficiary(ies)/Claimant(s)</li> 
 <li>Original Policy Document</li> 
 <li>Copy of Bank Account Proof of Beneficiary (applicable for sole or joint name bank account)</li> 
</ul>
</div></div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_11" class="remove-bottom-space A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <h4 class="A-TYP16B-RW-ALL heading">Major Illness/ Female Benefit/ Terminal Illness Claims</h4>
</div></div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_12" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <ul class="A-LSTU-RW-ALL"> 
 <li>Major Illness/ Female Benefit/ Terminal Illness Claim Form with Part I fully completed and signed by the Policyholder/Claimant/Insured Person and/or Dementia Protection Benefit Recipient</li> 
 <li>Major Illness/ Female Benefit/ Terminal Illness Claim Form with Part II fully completed and signed by the Attending Physician with chop</li> 
 <li>Major Illness/ Female Benefit/ Terminal Illness Claim Form with Part III fully completed and signed by the Policyholder/Claimant/Insured Person and/or Dementia Protection Benefit Recipient (if applicable)</li> 
 <li>Copy of Histopathology, Laboratory Test Report, Endoscopy, Ultrasonogram, X-Ray, CT Scan, MRI, Diagnostic Written Report(s) and Operating theatre summary (if applicable)</li> 
 <li>Copy of Policyholder and Insured Person's Identity Card</li> 
 <li>Copy of Bank Account Proof (applicable for Policyholder's sole or joint name bank account other than Policyholder's premium deduction account)</li> 
</ul>
</div></div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_13" class="remove-bottom-space A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <h4 class="A-TYP16B-RW-ALL heading">VHIS Medical Claims</h4>
</div></div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_14" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <ul class="A-LSTU-RW-ALL"> 
 <li>VHIS Medical Claim Form with Part I fully completed and signed by the Policyholder/Insured Person</li> 
 <li>VHIS Medical Claim Form with Part II fully completed and signed by the Attending Physician/ Surgeon with chop (to be obtained by Insured Person/ Claimant)</li> 
 <li>Original receipt(s) of the medical expenses (including but not limited to deposit receipt)</li> 
 <li>Copy of settlement advice from other insurer (if applicable)</li> 
 <li>Copy of Histopathology, Laboratory Test Report, Endoscopy, Ultrasonogram, X-Ray, CT Scan, MRI, Diagnostic Written Report(s) and Operating theatre summary (if applicable)</li> 
 <li>Copy of Bank Account Proof (applicable for Policyholder's sole or joint-name bank account other than Policyholder's premium deduction account)</li> 
</ul>
</div></div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_15" class="remove-bottom-space A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <h4 class="A-TYP16B-RW-ALL heading">Disability Claims</h4>
</div></div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_16" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <ul class="A-LSTU-RW-ALL"> 
 <li>Disability Claim Form with Part I fully completed and signed by the Policyholder/Insured Person</li> 
 <li>Disability Claim Form with Part II fully completed and signed by the Attending Physician with chop (this report required to be applied by the claimant at his/her own cost)</li> 
 <li>Copy of Histopathology, Laboratory Test Report, Endoscopy, Ultrasonogram, X-Ray, CT Scan, MRI, Diagnostic Written Report(s) and Operating theatre summary (if applicable)</li> 
 <li>Copy of Sick Leave Certificate with diagnosis and/ or Consultation Proof</li> 
 <li>Copy of Physiotherapy/ Occupational Therapy Report(s) (if applicable)</li> 
 <li>Copy of Police Report (if applicable)</li> 
 <li>Copy of Policyholder & Insured's Identity Card</li> 
 <li>Copy of Bank Account Proof (applicable for Policyholder's sole or joint name bank account other than Policyholder's premium deduction account)</li> 
</ul>
</div></div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_17" class="remove-bottom-space A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <h4 class="A-TYP16B-RW-ALL heading">Hospital Cash Benefit Claims</h4>
</div></div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_18" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <ul class="A-LSTU-RW-ALL"> 
 <li>Hospital Cash Benefit Claim Form with Part I fully completed and signed by the Policyholder/Insured Person</li> 
 <li>Hospital Cash Benefit Claim Form with Part II fully completed and signed by the Attending Physician with chop (this report required to be applied by the claimant at his/her own cost)</li> 
 <li>Copy of Discharge Summary/Discharge Slip if admitted into a hospital(s) under the Hospital Authority</li> 
 <li>Copy of full set Hospital Receipt</li> 
 <li>Copy of Laboratory, Ultrasonogram, X-Ray, CT Scan, MRI and Diagnostic Written Report(s) (if applicable)</li> 
 <li>Copy of Policyholder & Insured Person's Identity Card</li> 
 <li>Copy of Bank Account Proof (applicable for Policyholder's sole or joint-name bank account other than Policyholder's premium deduction account)</li> 
</ul>

            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="-274430929__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_14">
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100 ">
        
        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_24" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_25" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <ul class="A-LSTU-RW-ALL"> 
 <li>If a designated beneficiary has been appointed, the death benefit will be paid to the beneficiary</li> 
 <li>If a designated minor beneficiary has been appointed, the death benefit will be paid to the designated trustee or the legal guardian (if no designated trustee is assigned)</li> 
 <li>If a designated beneficiary has been appointed but deceased before the insured person, the death benefit will be paid to the policyowner</li> 
 <li>If no beneficiary has been appointed and the policyowner is alive, the death benefit will be paid to the policyowner</li> 
 <li>If no beneficiary has been appointed and the policyowner is not alive, the proceeds are payable to the estate of the policyowner</li> 
 <li>If the policy has been assigned, the assigned amount of proceeds are first payable to the assignee according to Assignment Deeds and the balance amount of proceeds will be payable according to above rules</li> 
</ul>
</div></div>
